comments:
When running Eclipse's Ant from the command line, a Null Pointer Exception is 
thrown if the -file flag is not present. Ant should default to using the 
build.xml file in the current directory if -file is not present.

A sample command line and its output are given below: (ran using build 20020502)

D:\tmp\eclipse>java -cp startup.jar org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main -application 
org.eclipse.ant.core.antRunner
java.lang.NullPointerException
        at java.util.Hashtable.put(Hashtable.java:397)
        at org.apache.tools.ant.Project.setUserProperty(Project.java:277)
        at org.eclipse.ant.internal.core.ant.InternalAntRunner.setProperties
(InternalAntRunner.java:186)
        at org.eclipse.ant.internal.core.ant.InternalAntRunner.run
(InternalAntRunner.java:253)
        at org.eclipse.ant.internal.core.ant.InternalAntRunner.run
(InternalAntRunner.java:394)
        at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Native Method)
        at org.eclipse.ant.core.AntRunner.run(AntRunner.java:170)
        at org.eclipse.core.internal.boot.InternalBootLoader.run
(InternalBootLoader.java:733)
        at org.eclipse.core.boot.BootLoader.run(BootLoader.java:349)
        at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Native Method)
        at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.basicRun(Main.java:162)
        at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.run(Main.java:588)
        at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.main(Main.java:437)
java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException: java.lang.NullPointerException
        at java.util.Hashtable.put(Hashtable.java:397)
        at org.apache.tools.ant.Project.setUserProperty(Project.java:277)
        at org.eclipse.ant.internal.core.ant.InternalAntRunner.setProperties
(InternalAntRunner.java:186)
        at org.eclipse.ant.internal.core.ant.InternalAntRunner.run
(InternalAntRunner.java:253)
        at org.eclipse.ant.internal.core.ant.InternalAntRunner.run
(InternalAntRunner.java:394)
        at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Native Method)
        at org.eclipse.ant.core.AntRunner.run(AntRunner.java:170)
        at org.eclipse.core.internal.boot.InternalBootLoader.run
(InternalBootLoader.java:733)
        at org.eclipse.core.boot.BootLoader.run(BootLoader.java:349)
        at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Native Method)
        at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.basicRun(Main.java:162)
        at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.run(Main.java:588)
        at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.main(Main.java:437)

The default value is now set to <user.dir>/build.xml
Fixed.
